item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (22 points | 17 comments)
2. Show HN: Replace "hub" by "ingest" in GitHub URLs for a prompt-friendly extract (58 points | 19 comments)
3. cli53 – Command line tool for Amazon Route 53 (7 points | discuss)
4. Federal Court Says Dismantling a Phone to Install Firmware Isn't a 'Search' (117 points | 47 comments)
5. Training myself to run farther with Strava's API and an IoT dog feeder of M&Ms (56 points | 15 comments)
6. 7 Databases in 7 Weeks for 2025 (3 points | discuss)
7. Diátaxis – A systematic approach to technical documentation authoring (383 points | 89 comments)
8. Genie 2: A large-scale foundation world model (1150 points | 377 comments)
9. Waymo announces Miami as its next ride hailing city (130 points | 109 comments)
10. They don't make them like that any more: the Yamaha DX7 keyboard (267 points | 173 comments)
11. Sitters and Standers (354 points | 184 comments)
12. Oscilloscope Music N-Spheres (92 points | 16 comments)
13. Bringing K/V context quantisation to Ollama (200 points | 27 comments)
14. Humanloop (YC S20) Is Hiring Product Engineers in London and SF ( | hide)
15. Move semantics in Rust, C++, and Hylo (82 points | 95 comments)
16. AI helps researchers dig through old maps to find lost oil and gas wells (215 points | 95 comments)
17. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (1135 points | 449 comments)
18. Show HN: Outerbase Studio – Open-Source Database GUI (308 points | 130 comments)
19. VectorChord: Store 400k Vectors for $1 in PostgreSQL (136 points | 35 comments)
20. Why America's economy is soaring ahead of its rivals (421 points | 1899 comments)
21. Native dual-range input (231 points | 41 comments)
22. The story of Rogue (239 points | 94 comments)
23. Show HN: I combined spaced repetition with emails so you can remember anything (212 points | 78 comments)
24. Big Endian's Guide to SQLite Storage (17 points | discuss)
25. WASM-4: Build retro games using WebAssembly for a fantasy console (124 points | 32 comments)
26. IMG_0001 (1742 points | 277 comments)
27. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C in Ruby (277 points | 110 comments)
28. The Surprising New History of Horse Domestication (25 points | 16 comments)
29. Ampere WS-1 Japanese APL Clamtop (51 points | 6 comments)
30. Launch HN: Parsagon (YC W21) – AI for public affairs and government relations (65 points | 48 comments)
